thread.title: Kelly Brook looks worlds away from her sexy style in LA
thread.title_full: Kelly Brook looks worlds away from her sexy style in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: MailOnline Reporter
title: Kelly Brook looks worlds away from her sexy style in LA
text:
She soared to fame with her stunning good looks, buxom curves and risqué red carpet ensembles.
Yet accelerate nearly two decades and it is clear to see Kelly Brook has pared things back as she was spotted taking a low-key stroll with her hunky boyfriend Jeremy Parisi in Los Angeles on Monday.
The 37-year-old Piranha 3D star went for a super minimal look as she slipped into ripped jeans and a checked shirt while showing off her make-up free complexion - in a stark difference to the looks fans have come to know.
Scroll down for video
Get a girl who can do both: Kelly Brook has pared things back from her uber glamorous looks of days gone (pictured right at LFW in 2012) by as illustrated during an outing in Los Angeles on Monday (left)
Kelly first became known as a model after her mum entered her into a competition at the tender age of 16, before she scored huge deals with brands including Bravissimo, Renault Mégane, Walker's crisps, Foster's Lager and Piz Buin.
She later dipped her toe into acting, yet it was her high profile romances to stars including Billy Zane, Jason Statham and Thom Evans which really propelled her into the limelight.
The Kent-born beauty has now happily found love with hunky Frenchman Jeremy, with whom she enjoyed her outing on Monday - following a trip to the spa.
Having seemingly undergone a facial, Kelly showed off an astonishingly glowing complexion with not a scrap of make-up in sight.
Hot stuff! The 37-year-old Piranha 3D star went for a super minimal look as she slipped into ripped jeans and a checked shirt while showing off her make-up free complexion - in a stark difference to the looks fans have come to know
Golden girl: Kelly's perky cleavage is typically eye-popping yet she was all wrapped up on Monday (pictured at the Skyfall premiere in 2012)
Sexing it up: Kelly knows how to work in on the red carpet (pictured in October last year)
She slicked her brunette tresses into a slick ponytail which made the most of exhibiting her whole face, while she added in some gold hoop earrings to give a touch of glamour to the otherwise low-key look.
Showing off the famous curves for which she's become known, Kelly wore eye-wateringly tight ripped jeans with a stonewash detailing.
Kelly proved she has an edgy touch to fashion as she pulled on a stylish white slogan T-shirt paired with a battered checked shirt over the top which seemed to give a vintage vibe to her usually polished look.
The couple's day out came shortly after the stunning star stunned her 690,000 Instagram followers as she posted a snapshot of herself in the bath of her hotel room during a romantic break to NYC - while flaunting her totally naked form.
Oh my! The couple's day out came shortly after the stunning star stunned her 690,000 Instagram folllowers as she posted a snapshot of herself in the bath of her hotel room - while flaunting her totally naked form
The shot, taken from behind, shows the model and actress gazing at a spectacular view of the Big Apple alongside the caption: 'Bath with a view.'
The brunette's hair is pulled into a bun and she is seen in the water leaning onto the window sill of the room while admiring the scenery.
Kelly was enjoying a romantic city break with her French beau and has been posting an array of selfies with her boyfriend all over the city.
A snap of the pair cuddling up on the Brooklyn Bridge was captioned 'cheesy tourists' while another shot of herself tucking into a slice of pizza was captioned 'Happy place.'
Kiss, kiss: A snap of the pair cuddling up on the Brooklyn Bridge was captioned 'cheesy tourists' while another shot of herself tucking into a slice of pizza was captioned 'Happy place'
